description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. As one of the last survivors immune to the dangerous LRKR virus, you have decided to make a final stand in a small farm located in the eastern Colorado region. Battle against endless waves of lurkers and mutants to show your strength and will to survive. Construct, purchase, and upgrade 18 different and dangerous weapons as you fight for survival against the hostile infected horde.
